landing.introduction.title: Seniors e Juniors Juntos
landing.introduction.subtitle: Let's get stuff done with fun!
landing.introduction.description: As you know seniors in IT and engineering are less available and
expensive. That trend doesn’t seem to change at all. Let’s stop that
madness and put seniors and juniors together as teams.Senjun teams are
eager to learn and to help you with your compelx IT problems.
landing.benefits.title: SENJUN TEAMS - VALUES
landing.benefits.card.together.title: Together
landing.benefits.card.together.content: Senjun teams consist of Seniors and Juinors
landing.benefits.card.learning.title: Learning
landing.benefits.card.fair.title: Fair
landing.benefits.card.grow.title: Grow
landing.benefits.card.simple.title: Simple
landing.benefits.card.simple.content: Payments are managed either by task or hour
